body:
@jucie No offence, IMPO, this issue is breaking canonicality (uniqueness).
Your CL seems to compromising without fixing the issue itself for me.
If there is a only choice, I agree with you 100%, but it's not true.

For example, (not tested)
we can drop current implementation, and remake it by `CreateFile` and `GetFinalPathNameByHandle`.
It's not the best solution, it requires [hacky workaround](https://gist.github.com/hirochachacha/bba426b5defff3d8f5fe#file-fchdir_windows-go). In this mean, it is also kind of compromising.

I don't know what is important for go's decision-making.
Even if we cannot find the flawless solution, the choice (of compromising) might be better than just compromising.
